Class Beta

  • java.lang.Object
    • Beta
  • public final class Beta
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has all methods which need to calculate the value beta function successfully.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Smit Pateliya

    • Method Detail

      • validateInputs

        boolean validateInputs​(double validate)
        This method validates input which is given by user. So, program does not encounter overflow errors.
        Parameters:
        validate - Positive real number entered by user.
        Returns:
        True If value is more than 200 or less than 0. Else it is returning false.

      • power1

        double power1​(double value,
              double power)
        This method calculates power of the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of which the power is to be determined
        power - The power of the given value.
        Returns:
        The result of the value^power

      • calculateBetaStirling

        double calculateBetaStirling​(double p,
                             double q,
                             double r)
        This method calculates the Beta function of the given values.
        Parameters:
        p - The value which is entered by user.
        q - The value which is entered by user.
        r - The supporting value to calculate the Beta function with the help of the Gamma Function.
        Returns:
        The result of the Beta Function.

        q - The value which is entered by user.
